name: SplurgeStopper
0:
”Alexa, ask Splurge Stopper why I shouldn't spend 50 dollars.”
”Alexa, ask Splurge Stopper why I shouldn't spend 120 dollars and 46 cents.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: splurge stopper
des:
You can ask Splurge Stopper why you shouldn't spend a certain amount of money, and it will reply with how much money you might have in the future if you invest it instead.

It assumes an inflation-adjusted annualized return rate of six percent. The historical rate for the S&P 500 is between six and seven percent.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
